card.name: Adder-Staff Boggart
card.text: When Adder-Staff Boggart enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Adder-Staff Boggart.

card.name: AEthersnipe
card.text: When AEthersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U}

card.name: Ajani Goldmane
card.text: +1: You gain 2 life. -1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. -6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

card.name: Amoeboid Changeling
card.text: Changeling {T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn. {T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Amphitheater
card.text: As Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Giant card from your hand. If you don't, Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Aquitect's Will
card.text: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.

card.name: Arbiter of Knollridge
card.text: Vigilance When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

card.name: Ashling the Pilgrim
card.text: {1}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ashling the Pilgrim. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, remove all +1/+1 counters from Ashling the Pilgrim, and it deals that much damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Ashling's Prerogative
card.text: As Ashling's Prerogative enters the battlefield, choose odd or even. Each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value has haste. Each creature without converted mana cost of the chosen value enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Auntie's Hovel
card.text: As Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Goblin card from your hand. If you don't, Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Austere Command
card.text: Choose two - Destroy all artifacts; or destroy all enchantments; or destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less; or destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Battle Mastery
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike.

card.name: Battlewand Oak
card.text: Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Benthicore
card.text: When Benthicore enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens onto the battlefield. Tap two untapped Merfolk you control: Untap Benthicore. It gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Black Poplar Shaman
card.text: {2}{B}: Regenerate target Treefolk.

card.name: Blades of Velis Vel
card.text: Changeling Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Blind-Spot Giant
card.text: Blind-Spot Giant can't attack or block unless you control another Giant.

card.name: Bog Hoodlums
card.text: Bog Hoodlums can't block. When Bog Hoodlums enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Hoodlums.

card.name: Boggart Birth Rite
card.text: Return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Boggart Forager
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Boggart Forager: Target player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Boggart Harbinger
card.text: When Boggart Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Boggart Loggers
card.text: Forestwalk {2}{B}, Sacrifice Boggart Loggers: Destroy target Treefolk or Forest.

card.name: Boggart Mob
card.text: Champion a Goblin Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Boggart Shenanigans
card.text: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Boggart Sprite-Chaser
card.text: As long as you control a Faerie, Boggart Sprite-Chaser gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Bog-Strider Ash
card.text: Swampwalk Whenever a player casts a Goblin spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Briarhorn
Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile
card.text: First strike {T}: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile deals 2 damage to each attacking or blocking creature target player controls.

card.name: Brion Stoutarm
card.text: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature other than Brion Stoutarm: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.

card.name: Broken Ambitions
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that spell's controller puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
card.text: Protection from red Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.

card.name: Cairn Wanderer
card.text: Changeling As long as a creature card with flying is in a graveyard, Cairn Wanderer has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, landwalk, lifelink, protection, reach, trample, shroud, and vigilance.

card.name: Captivating Glance
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your end step, clash with an opponent. If you win, gain control of enchanted creature. Otherwise, that player gains control of enchanted creature.

card.name: Caterwauling Boggart
card.text: Each Goblin you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. Each Elemental you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Ceaseless Searblades
card.text: Whenever you activate an ability of an Elemental, Ceaseless Searblades gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Cenn's Heir
card.text: Whenever Cenn's Heir attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kithkin.

card.name: Chandra Nalaar
card.text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player. -X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. -8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Cloudthresher
card.text: Flash Reach When Cloudthresher enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Evoke {2}{G}{G}

card.name: Colfenor's Plans
card.text: When Colfenor's Plans enters the battlefield, exile the top seven cards of your library face down. You may look at and play cards exiled with Colfenor's Plans. Skip your draw step. You can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Colfenor's Urn
card.text: Whenever a creature with toughness 4 or greater is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. At the beginning of the end step, if three or more cards have been exiled with Colfenor's Urn, sacrifice it. If you do, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Consuming Bonfire
card.text: Choose one - Consuming Bonfire deals 4 damage to target non-Elemental creature; or Consuming Bonfire deals 7 damage to target Treefolk creature.

card.name: Crib Swap
card.text: Changeling Exile target creature. Its controller puts a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling onto the battlefield.

card.name: Crush Underfoot
card.text: Choose a Giant creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Cryptic Command
card.text: Choose two - Counter target spell; or return target permanent to its owner's hand; or tap all creatures your opponents control; or draw a card.

card.name: Dauntless Dourbark
card.text: Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control. Dauntless Dourbark has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

Deathrender

card.text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

card.name: Dread

card.text: Whenever a player casts a Giant spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Handservant.

card.name: Elvish Harbinger
card.text: When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Elvish Promenade
card.text: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.

card.name: Entangling Trap
card.text: Whenever you clash, tap target creature an opponent controls. If you won, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and has trample.
